snippet: Karim Benzema scored to help Real Madrid eke out a 1-0 win over Granada on Saturday and take the overnight lead of the Spanish league.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Real Madrid defeats Granada, 1-0; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Karim Benzema scored to help Real Madrid eke out a 1-0 win over Granada on Saturday and take the overnight lead of the Spanish league.

headline.main: Madrid Moves Into First With Shutout of Granada
headline.print_headline: Madrid Moves Into First With Shutout of Granada
